sn12.38:1.2: “Yanca, bhikkhave, ceteti yanca pakappeti yanca anuseti, arammanametam hoti vinnanassa thitiya.
sn12.38:1.4: Tasmim patitthite vinnane virulhe ayatim punabbhavabhinibbatti hoti.
sn12.38:1.5: Ayatim punabbhavabhinibbattiya sati ayatim jati jaramaranam sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupayasa sambhavanti.
sn12.38:2.1: No ce, bhikkhave, ceteti no ce pakappeti, atha ce anuseti, arammanametam hoti vinnanassa thitiya.
sn12.38:2.3: Tasmim patitthite vinnane virulhe ayatim punabbhavabhinibbatti hoti.
sn12.38:2.4: Ayatim punabbhavabhinibbattiya sati ayatim jati jaramaranam sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupayasa sambhavanti.
sn12.38:3.1: Yato ca kho, bhikkhave, no ceva ceteti no ca pakappeti no ca anuseti, arammanametam na hoti vinnanassa thitiya.
sn12.38:3.2: Arammane asati patittha vinnanassa na hoti.
sn12.38:3.3: Tadappatitthite vinnane avirulhe ayatim punabbhavabhinibbatti na hoti.
sn12.38:3.4: Ayatim punabbhavabhinibbattiya asati ayatim jati jaramaranam sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupayasa nirujjhanti.
